description.narrative: This package has been set up to support the delivery of urgent rapid response and ongoing efforts to support earthquake affected communities in Nepal after two earthquakes hit the region in April/May 2015. This appeal is supported by a Christian Aid Appeal (3E091) and the DEC (4D091)

participating-org.narrative: DO NOT USE International Organisation for Migration

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom

sector.code: CLIMATE CHANGE MITIGATION/PRO POOR RENEWABLE ENERGY
EMERGENCY RESPONSE – WATER, SANITATION AND HYGIENE
